{{Infobox battle item |name = Macho Brace |image = [[File:Macho Brace.png]] |caption = In-game image of the ''Macho Brace''. |price = 2,000 {{questpoints}} |location =
*[[Macho Brace#Shops|Shops]] }} == Description == The '''Macho Brace''' is a type of held item that can be equipped to any Pokémon that has been infected with [[Pokérus]]. == Details == Increases EVs gained of the Pokémon holding the item by 100%. == Acquisition == ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Items}} {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Sinnoh: Locations & Items|Fight Area]]|2,000 {{questpoints}}}} |} |} {{Held Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Held Items]]
